name: Walk A Mile
description:
Walk A Mile

We believe that the key to breaking down stereotypes and combating ignorance is through education.

Because of this we wanted to develop a game to bring awareness to some struggles that the Blind & Deaf communities face on a daily basis. 

Visually and hearing impaired people encounter so many different experiences and face being alienated by society simply because they are different from the “normal” that society has perpetuated. At the end of the day, these people are just like everyone else and deserve to be included, heard, and validated.

“A good education is the foundation for a better future.” - Warren

*this game is optimized for full screen mode*
